title: Quality Assurance Engineer
description:
**Position Overview** 




 Hala Campus is seeking a highly skilled and detail\\-oriented QA Engineer with over 4 years of experience to join our team in Rajkot, Gujarat. As a QA Engineer, you will be responsible for ensuring the quality and functionality of our web and mobile applications. You will work closely with developers, product managers, and designers to ensure that our products meet the highest standards of quality and user experience. You will play a key role in testing, automating, and refining processes to ensure that our products exceed customer expectations.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 



* Design, implement, and execute test plans, test cases, and test scripts for web and mobile applications.
* Perform functional, regression, performance, and security testing to ensure product quality.
* Collaborate with developers to understand application features and design appropriate test strategies.
* Identify, document, and track software defects, collaborating with the development team to resolve issues.
* Develop and maintain automated test scripts for regression and performance testing.
* Continuously improve testing processes and methodologies to enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of the QA team.
* Stay up\\-to\\-date with industry trends and emerging technologies in quality assurance and testing practices.



  





**Qualifications** 



* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
* 4\\+ years of professional experience in software testing and quality assurance.
* Strong understanding of manual and automated testing processes, methodologies, and tools.
* Experience with test automation tools such as Selenium, Cypress, or similar.
* Proficiency in bug tracking and test management tools (e.g., JIRA, TestRail, or similar).
* Hands\\-on experience with web and mobile application testing, including browser compatibility and responsive design.
* Solid understanding of databases (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL) and ability to write SQL queries for testing purposes.
* Familiarity with Agile/Scrum development methodologies.
* Strong problem\\-solving skills, attention to detail, and excellent analytical abilities.
* Ability to communicate technical issues and solutions to both technical and non\\-technical stakeholders.



  





**Bonus Skills** 



* Experience with API testing using tools like Postman or Swagger.
* Familiarity with performance testing tools such as JMeter or LoadRunner.
* Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices.
* Experience with cloud computing platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.
* Knowledge of scripting languages (e.g., Python, Shell scripting) for automating test cases.
* Familiarity with version control systems like Git.
* This job description should attract qualified candidates with the skills and experience you're seeking for a QA role at Hala Campus in Rajkot. Let me know if you'd like to adjust any part of it!



  





**About Us** 




 At Hala Campus, we're not just building software‚Äîwe‚Äôre transforming the future of education technology. Our goal is to make learning more engaging, accessible, and fun for students around the world. We‚Äôre a passionate team that values creativity, collaboration, and innovation. If you‚Äôre looking for a role that challenges you and gives you the chance to make a real impact, Hala Campus is the place to be.

title: DevOps Engineer, 12+ YoE
description:
***Job Title: Senior DevOps Engineer***









***Location:* 
 Hyderabad/Bangalore** 




***Experience: 12\\+ Years***




***Employment Type: Full\\-time***









***Job Summary:***




*We are seeking a highly experienced Senior DevOps Engineer with over 12 years of experience in designing, implementing, and managing CI/CD pipelines, cloud infrastructure, and system automation. The ideal candidate will also have strong hands\\-on experience with SQL and database management to support application and infrastructure integration.* 









*You will play a key role in bridging the gap between development, operations, and data teams to ensure seamless delivery of scalable and reliable software solutions.* 









***Key Responsibilities:***



* *Design, implement, and manage CI/CD pipelines to enable efficient and secure software delivery.*
* *Build and maintain infrastructure as code using tools like Terraform, Ansible, or CloudFormation.*
* *Administer and monitor cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or GCP.*
* *Implement robust monitoring, logging, and alerting systems (e.g., Prometheus, Grafana, ELK).*
* *Collaborate with development and QA teams to streamline code deployment, testing, and release.*
* *Optimize infrastructure for performance, scalability, and cost\\-efficiency.*
* *Provide support for production environments, ensuring high availability and disaster recovery.*
* *Write and optimize SQL queries, perform data extraction and transformation for reporting or integration needs.*
* *Ensure system and data security best practices are applied throughout the DevOps lifecycle.*
* *Mentor junior team members and provide leadership in DevOps best practices.*








***Required Skills \\& Qualifications:***



* *12\\+ years of experience in DevOps, Cloud Infrastructure, or System Engineering roles.*
* *Strong experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP).*
* *Proficient with CI/CD tools like Jenkins, GitLab CI, CircleCI, etc.*
* *Hands\\-on experience with containerization and orchestration (Docker, Kubernetes).*
* *Solid understanding of networking, security, and system administration.*
* *Proficiency in SQL with experience in databases such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MS SQL Server.*
* *Excellent communication, collaboration, and problem\\-solving skills.*








***Preferred Qualifications:***



* *Certifications in AWS, Azure, Kubernetes, or DevOps tools.*
* *Experience in managing hybrid or multi\\-cloud environments.*
* *Familiarity with Agile/Scrum methodologies.*
* *Exposure to data pipelines or ETL processes is a plus.*








***Why Join Us?***



* *Work on cutting\\-edge cloud and DevOps technologies.*
* *Be part of a collaborative and high\\-performing engineering culture.*
* *Competitive compensation and benefits.*
* *Opportunities for growth and continuous learning.*



  





*Thanks and Regards* 




*Jerin L Varghese*

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
We are looking for someone who can code, and is also willing to communicate with clients.
 



  





 The ideal candidate is a self\\-motivated, multi\\-tasker, and demonstrated team\\-player. You will be a lead developer responsible for the development of new software products and enhancements to existing products.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 



* Writing clean, high\\-quality, high\\-performance, maintainable code
* Manage stakeholders and communicate with clients
* Lead a small team



  





  





**Qualifications** 



* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science (or related field)
* 7\\+ years of relevant work experience



  





  





**Skills \\& Traits We‚Äôre Looking For \\- Must Have** 



* Experience with Agile or Scrum software development methodologies
* Ability to multi\\-task, organize, and prioritize work
* Solid TypeScript/JS and Python experience
* React, Node/Express, REST APIs
* Git, Docker, Linux familiarity
* Understanding of embeddings, vector stores, LangChain/LlamaIndex
* Self\\-starter mindset \\- comfortable moving in ambiguity
* Worked on RAG or LLM\\-driven tools



  





  





**About Pints AI** 




 Pints AI is a multi\\-award\\-winning AI company based in Singapore, known for deploying on\\-premise, privacy\\-preserving AI systems in some of Asia‚Äôs most regulated industries \\- including banks, insurers, and government entities.
 



  




* Won AI in Finance Global Challenge (2023\\) at SFF in Singapore
* Built the 1\\.5 Pints open\\-source model \\- a compact LLM outperforming Apple‚Äôs OpenELM and Microsoft‚Äôs Phi\\-1\\.5
* Developed Autothought, our AI reporting engine, now used to replace business analysts in regulated verticals
* Engineered SentientRAG, a low\\-hallucination RAG framework optimized for compliance\\-heavy data



  





  





**What You‚Äôll Do** 




 1\\. Prototype Real\\-World AI Use Cases
 


* Apply Autothought to solve problems in claims, compliance, risk, onboarding, and more
* Build custom copilots and chat\\-based workflows trained on internal knowledge
* Deploy domain\\-tuned RAG, fine\\-tuned models, and secure NLP pipelines



  





  





 2\\. Full\\-Stack Software Engineering
 


* Own the development of AI\\-powered internal tools (React \\+ Express)
* Ship fast in feedback loops while balancing reliability and privacy
* Work within a secure, tightly monitored infrastructure



  





  





 3\\. Client Collaboration \\+ BFSI Exposure
 


* Sit alongside business, compliance, and tech teams inside the client
* Shape requirements, validate assumptions, and ship iteratively
* Learn the operating realities of one of India‚Äôs top BFSI brands



  





  





 4\\. Cross\\-Pollinate with Pints AI‚Äôs R\\&D
 


* Stay plugged into our research team‚Äôs work on LLM orchestration, embeddings, and compression
* Contribute to internal tools and open\\-source libraries when off client delivery cycles
* Level up fast through mentorship, feedback, and hands\\-on deployments

title: AI Engineer Intern - AI/ML/GenAI Design & Development
description:
**About PM Accelerator:** 
 PM Accelerator is a US based company with a global reach premiering in¬†AI learning and as a development hub, featuring award\\-winning AI products and mentors from top\\-tier companies such as Google, Meta, Apple, and Nvidia. We offer a dynamic AI PM Bootcamp, designed to empower the next generation of AI professionals through hands\\-on experience, mentorship, and real\\-world projects.
 



  





**Company Website:** 
 https://www.pmaccelerator.io/
 



  





**Role Overview:** 
 We are seeking passionate and motivated AI Engineering Interns for the Summer 2025 semester to partner with other professionals within the USA. This internship is ideal for individuals with a strong interest in AI, eager to learn and explore cutting\\-edge AI tools and frameworks and want to have experience interning at a U.S. based company. As part of our team, you will work on projects involving large language models (LLMs), machine learning, prompt engineering, GenAI application development, ChatGPT API integration, and data pipeline development. You will collaborate with a multidisciplinary team, including AI\\-software engineers, data scientists, UI/UX designers and product managers from our PM Accelerator community to bring innovative tech ideas to life.
 



  





**Requirements:** 
 International Candidates¬†
 *(non\\-US or Canada)* 
 ¬†must be willing to overlap at least 4\\-hours per day to communicate with US teams.¬†The times can be negotiable with the teams once accepted and joining on an AI product. Fluency in English is necessary.¬†
 



  





 AI Engineer Intern can be existing working software engineers, data scientist professionals or accredited college students Bachelors/Masters/PhD¬†¬†
 *(in Computer Science, Computer/Software Engineering, Data Analytics,¬†AI Engineering programs).* 
 ¬†
 


* *Front\\-end skills should primarily be in React.JS*
* Back\\-end skills should primarily be in Python
* Data Science skills should primarily be in modeling and data pipelines



  





 During your internship, you will work with PM Accelerator‚Äôs existing PM students, who are within the USA and around the world, inside of the AI PM bootcamp. They will drive real world user pain points into AI minimum\\-viable\\-product (MVP) solutions.
 



  





 Team Structure will be the following:
 


1. AI/ML Engineers \\- Front\\-end and/or Backend, or Data Science
2. Product Managers from the PMA community
3. UI/UX designers



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Collaborate with product managers, designers, and data scientists to design and develop AI\\-driven and GenAI applications.
* Engage in continuous learning and exploration of GenAI tools and frameworks, applying them in real\\-world scenarios.
* Contribute to either front\\-end or back\\-end development, depending on your expertise.
* Execute the integration of AI technologies, including LLMs, machine learning models, prompt engineering, and various APIs, into applications.
* Contribute to the creation and optimization of data pipelines supporting AI models and product features.
* Participate in regular team meetings and contribute to the agile development process.



  





**Required Skills:** 



* Strong interest in AI and a willingness to learn and explore GenAI tools and frameworks.
* Programming skills in languages such as Python, JavaScript (
 *React, Angular, Express.js, Node.js, NextJS)* 
 , or similar.
* Front\\-end and Back\\-end engineers are welcome; Full\\-Stack developers are preferred.
* Excellent problem\\-solving skills and ability to work in a collaborative environment.
* Strong communication skills, both written and verbal.



  





**Preferred Skills :** 



* Frontend: Ability to use asynchronous API calls in React via¬†fetch¬†or¬†axios¬†to make HTTP requests to an LLM API endpoint.
* Frontend: Ability to consider user interactions when interacting with a model and guide users accordingly
* Backend \\- Understanding of machine learning concepts and frameworks¬†
 *(e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch).*
* *Backend/Frontend \\- API integration \\- Familiarity with REST, GraphQL, or gRPC.*
* *Data Scientist \\=* 
 Familiarity with data pipelines: Ingestion, Cleaning/preprocessing, Transformation/Feature Engineering, Model Training/Evaluation, Model Deploying/Serving and Monitoring/Maintenance



  





**Benefits:** 



* **Hands\\-On Experience:** 
 ¬†Master the skills needed to develop and launch real\\-life GenAI products, a significant advantage for your future career.
* **Free AI Engineer Certification:** 
 ¬†Upon successful completion of the internship, you will receive an AI Engineer Certification.
* **LinkedIn Recognition:** 
 ¬†Add your role as an AI Engineer to your LinkedIn experience section, highlighting your work on the project.
* **Tech Advisor Support:** 
 ¬†Access weekly office hours hosted by our tech advisors to help guide your development.
* **Educational Resources:** 
 ¬†Gain access to recommended tech courses tailored for developers and data scientists.
* **Networking Opportunities:** 
 ¬†Connect with AI/ML engineer job referral opportunities within our AI Project community channel.
* **School Credit:** 
 ¬†Eligible to receive school credit if required by your university.
* **Fully\\-remote:** 
 ¬†We welcome qualified candidates from all over the world to apply for this position.



  





**Note:** 
 ¬†This is an unpaid internship opportunity with CPT and OPT sponsorship available for eligible candidates. If you already graduated, you are welcome to apply as well.
 



  





**Internship Timeline Options:** 



* **Option 1** 
 : Mid\\-January to Late\\-March (2026\\)
* **Option 2** 
 : Early\\-April to Mid\\-June (2026\\)
* **Option 3** 
 : Late\\-June to Late\\-August (2026\\)



  





 The internship program is a 3\\-month duration.
 



  





 Qualified candidates are encouraged to continue to a 6\\-month internship
 



  





**Application Process:** 
 To apply, please submit the following information:
 


1. Resume
2. Link to your LinkedIn profile
3. What time do you want to do the internship: Option 1, 2, or all of them
4. Cover letter explaining your interest in AI, why you are interested in this role, and how you hope to contribute to our team.
5. Link to your Github depository (if available).



  





 Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis.

title: No-code Tech Lead (Xano + FlutterFlow + APIs)
description:
**Location:** 
 On\\-site ‚Äì Koramangala, Bangalore, India
 



**Employment Type:** 
 Contract \\- Targeted Start of October 9th, 2025 \\- Fast Interview Process
 



**Estimated Compensation: ‚Çπ200,000 (for \\~8 weeks) \\+ Equity** 




  




 About ReadyOS
 
 ReadyOS is building the coordination layer for rental property turnovers. Our platform connects operators and vendors, automates compliance, and simplifies payments‚Äîturning a fragmented process into a scalable system. We‚Äôre a fast\\-moving early\\-stage startup with a focus on shipping, iteration, and smart automation.
 



  




 Role Overview
 
 We are looking for a Software Development Tech Lead specializing in Xano, FlutterFlow, and API development to join our small but growing team
 **on\\-site in Koramangala** 
 . This person will align the work of frontend and backend developers, enforce technical standards, and keep delivery on schedule. The Tech Lead will also use their own experience building platforms to shape architecture decisions, review implementations, and ensure the system functions as one coherent product. While not expected to write every line of code, they must be able to dive into details, resolve blockers, and model best practices for the team.
 



  




 Responsibilities
 * Own the overall
 **technical architecture** 
 of the ReadyOS platform, ensuring frontend, backend, and APIs fit together cleanly.
* Define and enforce
 **development standards** 
 (naming conventions, API contracts, data models, release process).
* Coordinate delivery across backend and frontend teams to keep milestones on track.
* Review code and workflows, identify risks early, and drive fixes before they become delays.
* Translate product requirements into technical specs and ensure they‚Äôre achievable within the timeframe.
* Act as the
 **technical decision\\-maker** 
 on trade\\-offs (e.g., performance vs. scope, third\\-party integrations vs. in\\-house builds).
* Mentor team members, helping less experienced developers understand best practices.
* Liaise directly with founders to ensure business objectives and technical execution stay aligned.



  




 Requirements
 * **Strong English proficiency, both written and spoken, for clear collaboration.**
* Proven experience as a
 **Tech Lead, Engineering Lead, or Senior Engineer** 
 on a SaaS or marketplace platform.
* Strong grasp of system architecture and API\\-first design.
* Familiarity with both
 **frontend (FlutterFlow)** 
 and
 **backend (Xano/APIs, databases)** 
 development workflows.
* Demonstrated ability to coordinate distributed teams and deliver against milestones.
* Strong communication and documentation skills, especially in fast\\-moving startup environments.
* Ability to balance hands\\-on problem solving with leadership and oversight.



  




 Nice to Have
 * Experience in property\\-tech, workflow SaaS, or fintech platforms.
* Background in compliance, payments, or integrations with external APIs (i.e. Stripe Payments)
* Exposure to scaling systems across multiple regions or jurisdictions.
* Comfort with DevOps basics (CI/CD, environments, monitoring).
* Previous early\\-stage startup experience, ideally building MVPs that scaled into production.



  




 Why Join ReadyOS
 * Early impact: shape product decisions and architecture.
* Lean, execution\\-focused culture.
* Opportunities to grow into leadership as the company scales.
* Competitive contract rate and potential for equity bonus.



  




 Compensation \\& Incentives
 * **Primary structure:** 
 Contract\\-based, with base pay plus milestone bonuses (e.g., architecture, API specs, integrations, compliance modules). Payments are tied to milestone completion:



 Weekly base: ‚Çπ15,000
 



 Per milestone: ‚Çπ20,000 (√ó4 \\= ‚Çπ80,000\\)
 



 \\- Architecture \\& Plan Approval
 



 \\- Ongoing Review \\& Integration
 



 \\- Issue Resolution \\& QA Oversight
 



 \\- Final Acceptance
 



 8 weeks: ‚Çπ105,000 base \\+ ‚Çπ80,000 milestones \\=
 **‚Çπ200,000 total** 



* **Bonus Equity option:** 
 For the right candidates, we are open to granting a small equity stake (up to 0\\.05% \\~5,000 shares) as an on\\-time/quality bonus.
* **Future potential:** 
 Strong performers may transition into a longer\\-term or leadership role as the backend team expands, but no ongoing commitment is guaranteed at this point.

title: Front End Director
description:
**Front End Director** 




  





**Location: Bangalore** 




  





**Front End Director** 




**Location: Bangalore** 




**Job Description:** 




**Our company that was founded in 2015 by a group of semiconductor professionals. Since then, the company has provided design services to several companies in the semiconductor industry through continuous service partnerships. We are a fast\\-growing company with a deep focus on getting excellent talent from the industry as well as picking exceptional talent from the academics.** 









**Our unique and transparent work culture has helped us to retain the best talent and we collectively deliver high quality design services. Our team has a vast experience, and we can serve our clients on various services like Physical Design, Full Custom Analog and Digital Custom Layout and Verification, RTL Design, Verification, Embedded and Firmware.** 




**we have offices in Bengaluru, Hyderabad, Toronto (Ontario, Canada) and California (US) in order to serve its customer based on their asks \\& needs.** 




**Front end Director** 



* **Would be responsible for development and execution on Design, DFT, and Verification, FPGA based design and development**
* **This role is primarily based in Bangalore with interaction and driving teams within India and globally**
* **The role will involve delivery and execution**
* **driving the team and methodologies and requires hands on experience in all aspects and stages of Design, frontend/backend, DFT, and Verification.**



**Responsibilities:** 



* **Fully own the Design, DFT, Verification for Subsystems/SOCs from Initial specification through TapeOut and beyond**
* **Driving FPGA and ASIC RTL/DFT/Verification Sign off, timing constraints, CDC and work with different functions like verification, synthesis, etc. to get to a production quality Silicon**
* **Leading various aspects of Test architecture including Scan \\& ATPG, Memory BIST, Logic BIST, Analog/PHY test and post\\-silicon support with test pattern generation**
* **Manage, build, and develop teams of fresh and experienced engineers.**
* **Train and mentor fresh engineers for increased productivity**
* **Build up strong collaboration with other R\\& D teams like Architecture, SOC**
* **Responsible for people development, goal setting and team performance.**
* **Developing project plans including resource, schedules, progress reports, verification plans, checklists and tracking milestones**
* **Holding periodic internal and external reviews to ensure quality and meet delivery criteria**
* **Working with various EDA vendors to deploy next gen Design technologies**
* **Ensure quality adherence during all stages of the project life cycle.**
* **Ensure that correct metrics are established to measure the Design Verification processes and goals**
* **Power Management Understanding**



**Requirements** 




**Requirements:** 



* **BTech /MTech with 15\\+ years‚Äô experience in Semiconductor industry.**
* **Candidate should be an experienced manager having experience of leading a team in SoC Design and Verification.**
* **Experience of SoCs based on ARM Core Architecture, RISC V, etc.**
* **Experiences in all aspects of DFT, including scan \\& ATPG, memory BIST, logic BIST, analog test, and post\\-silicon support.**
* **Strong domain knowledge of Clocking, System modes, Power management, debug, interconnect, security and other architectures**
* **Experience of working on Gate Level Sims with strong concepts of CDC, RDC, Power Aware GLS.**
* **Low Power intent verification using CPF, UPF**
* **Power management understanding, including techniques for optimizing design for Ultra Low Power.**
* **FPGA/Emulation/Prototyping**


- 


  





  





**Contact: Uday Bhaskar** 




**Mulya Technologies**

title: Java Application Engineer
description:
**Position:** 
 Full\\-time, Software Engineer, Senior Software Engineer
 



**Team:** 
 Technology
 



**Role:** 
 L3 Java Application Engineer
 



**Location:** 
 Noida
 



**Experience:** 
 4\\-6 Years
 



**Interview:** 
 Virtual \\+ Face\\-to\\-Face at Noida Office
 



**Shift** 
 : Rotational Shift
 



  





**About the Role** 




 We are looking for a highly skilled
 **L3 Application Technical Support Engineer** 
 to join our client‚Äôs Technology team. This role is critical in bridging customer issues that cannot be resolved by L1 (call center) or L2 (non\\-technical support) teams.
 



 As an L3 engineer, you will leverage your deep knowledge of applications, production data, and backend systems to analyze, troubleshoot, and resolve complex technical problems.
 



 You will work closely with development and operations teams, applying strong analytical and coding skills to provide quick workarounds, implement data fixes, and, when necessary, deliver production\\-ready code changes for upcoming releases. This position requires a strong engineering mindset with the ability to balance customer urgency, root\\-cause analysis, and long\\-term solutions.
 



**This role also includes participation in a rotational shift schedule (day/night), with shift allowance provided for night shifts.** 




  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* Act as the final escalation point (L3\\) for application\\-related issues unresolved by L1 and L2 teams.
* Troubleshoot complex issues by analyzing logs, production data, and code.
* Provide quick workarounds and data fixes when required to minimize customer impact.
* Perform root cause analysis, identify whether issues are data\\-related, configuration\\-related, or code\\-related, and take appropriate action.
* Collaborate with development teams to implement code fixes and ensure they are tested and released as part of the product lifecycle.
* Maintain strong ownership of issues through resolution and ensure high\\-quality documentation of fixes and root causes.
* Work in rotational shifts (day/night) as part of a global support model.
* Mentor and guide L2 team members to improve first\\-call resolution and reduce escalations.
* Continuously explore modern tools and AI\\-assisted platforms (e.g., Cursor, GitLab Copilot) to improve efficiency and productivity.



  





**Required Qualifications \\& Skills** 



* **Education:** 
 B.Tech/M.Tech in Computer Science or related field from a reputed institute.
* **Experience:** 
 4\\+ years in backend development and/or enterprise\\-grade application support.
* Strong expertise in Core Java and Spring Boot 3\\+, with hands\\-on experience in microservices architecture.
* Proficiency in SQL with the ability to write complex queries for troubleshooting and data fixes (PostgreSQL or Oracle preferred).
* Experience with ORM frameworks such as Hibernate.
* Solid understanding of OOP, system design, and design patterns.
* Proven ability to build, maintain, and troubleshoot RESTful APIs.
* Strong problem\\-solving skills with the ability to handle high\\-pressure scenarios.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with a team\\-first approach.
* Passion for technology, innovation, and leveraging AI\\-assisted coding tools.



  





**Why Join Our Client?** 



* Be part of a fast\\-growing, tech\\-driven company that values innovation and agility.
* Opportunity to work on mission\\-critical enterprise systems with high visibility.
* A culture of continuous learning, ownership, and innovation.
* Competitive compensation, including shift allowance for night shifts.
* Chance to explore and apply the latest AI\\-powered development tools.

title: Developer - L3
description:
Job description:
   

  

 Job Description
 
**Role Purpose** 




 The purpose of this role is to design, test and maintain software programs for operating systems or applications which needs to be deployed at a client end and ensure its meet 100% quality assurance parameters
 


 Õè
 
**Do** 




 1\\. Instrumental in understanding the requirements and design of the product/ software
 


* Develop software solutions by studying information needs, studying systems flow, data usage and work processes
* Investigating problem areas followed by the software development life cycle
* Facilitate root cause analysis of the system issues and problem statement
* Identify ideas to improve system performance and impact availability
* Analyze client requirements and convert requirements to feasible design
* Collaborate with functional teams or systems analysts who carry out the detailed investigation into software requirements
* Conferring with project managers to obtain information on software capabilities


 Õè
 
 2\\. Perform coding and ensure optimal software/ module development
 


* Determine operational feasibility by evaluating analysis, problem definition, requirements, software development and proposed software
* Develop and automate processes for software validation by setting up and designing test cases/scenarios/usage cases, and executing these cases
* Modifying software to fix errors, adapt it to new hardware, improve its performance, or upgrade interfaces.
* Analyzing information to recommend and plan the installation of new systems or modifications of an existing system
* Ensuring that code is error free or has no bugs and test failure
* Preparing reports on programming project specifications, activities and status
* Ensure all the codes are raised as per the norm defined for project / program / account with clear description and replication patterns
* Compile timely, comprehensive and accurate documentation and reports as requested
* Coordinating with the team on daily project status and progress and documenting it
* Providing feedback on usability and serviceability, trace the result to quality risk and report it to concerned stakeholders


 Õè
 
 3\\. Status Reporting and Customer Focus on an ongoing basis with respect to project and its execution
 


* Capturing all the requirements and clarifications from the client for better quality work
* Taking feedback on the regular basis to ensure smooth and on time delivery
* Participating in continuing education and training to remain current on best practices, learn new programming languages, and better assist other team members.
* Consulting with engineering staff to evaluate software\\-hardware interfaces and develop specifications and performance requirements
* Document and demonstrate solutions by developing documentation, flowcharts, layouts, diagrams, charts, code comments and clear code
* Documenting very necessary details and reports in a formal way for proper understanding of software from client proposal to implementation
* Ensure good quality of interaction with customer w.r.t. e\\-mail content, fault report tracking, voice calls, business etiquette etc
* Timely Response to customer requests and no instances of complaints either internally or externally


 Õè
 
**Deliver** 



**No.** 
**Performance Parameter** 
**Measure** 
 1\\.Continuous Integration, Deployment \\& Monitoring of Software100% error free on boarding \\& implementation, throughput %, Adherence to the schedule/ release plan2\\.Quality \\& CSATOn\\-Time Delivery, Manage software, Troubleshoot queries,¬†Customer experience, completion of assigned certifications for skill upgradation3\\.MIS \\& Reporting100% on time MIS \\& report generation
 
 ¬†
 







 ¬†
 



 Experience: 3\\-5 Years
   

 .
 



 ¬†
 



 Reinvent your world. We are building a modern Wipro. We are an end\\-to\\-end digital transformation partner with the boldest ambitions. To realize them, we need people inspired by reinvention. Of yourself, your career, and your skills. We want to see the constant evolution of our business and our industry. It has always been in our DNA \\- as the world around us changes, so do we. Join a business powered by purpose and a place that empowers you to design your own reinvention. Come to Wipro. Realize your ambitions. Applications from people with disabilities are explicitly welcome.

description:
**Location:** 
 On\\-site ‚Äì Koramangala, Bangalore, India
 



**Employment Type:** 
 Contract \\- Targeted Start of October 13th, 2025 \\- Fast Interview Process
 



**Estimated Compensation: ‚Çπ146,500 (for \\~7 weeks) \\+ Equity** 




  




 About ReadyOS
 
 ReadyOS is building the coordination layer for rental property turnovers. Our platform connects operators and vendors, automates compliance, and simplifies payments‚Äîturning a fragmented process into a scalable system. We‚Äôre a fast\\-moving early\\-stage startup with a focus on shipping, iteration, and smart automation.
 



  




 Role Overview
 
 We are looking for a Backend Engineer specializing in Xano and API development to join our small but growing team
 **on\\-site in Koramangala** 
 . You‚Äôll work directly with the founders and other early hires to design, build, and deliver features that make rental turnovers faster, safer, and more efficient.
 



  




 Responsibilities
 * Design and implement the
 **ReadyOS backend** 
 in Xano, including core data models, workflows, and API endpoints.
* Translate product requirements into a scalable database schema and business logic.
* Build backend workflows that bring the platform‚Äôs
 **dispatch and compliance algorithms** 
 to life.
* Develop tools for
 **insurance compliance** 
 , including document intake, validation logic, and standardized storage.
* Create and integrate
 **invoicing and payment modules** 
 , including escrow workflows and third\\-party services (e.g., Stripe Connect, SendGrid, Twilio).
* Ensure secure, reliable, and performant backend architecture suitable for scale.
* Document APIs, workflows, and data models for smooth handoff to frontend developers.
* Monitor and troubleshoot system performance, ensuring reliability across the stack.



  




 Requirements
 * **Strong English proficiency, both written and spoken, for clear collaboration.**
* Proven expertise with
 **Xano** 
 (data modeling, business logic, APIs, scaling).
* Strong understanding of
 **relational database design** 
 and
 **API\\-first architecture** 
 .
* Experience integrating external APIs and third\\-party services (payments, compliance, identity, storage).
* Ability to translate algorithmic specifications into backend logic and workflows.
* Strong grasp of
 **secure data handling** 
 and best practices for authentication/authorization.
* Experience collaborating with frontend developers to connect APIs and align workflows.
* Comfort working in a fast\\-paced startup environment with evolving requirements.



  




 Nice to Have
 * Prior experience with
 **compliance or insurance systems** 
 (document validation, regulatory workflows).
* Exposure to
 **fintech** 
 or marketplace platforms.
* Knowledge of role\\-based access control (RBAC) and multi\\-tenant system design.
* Familiarity with monitoring, logging, and performance optimization in no\\-code/low\\-code stacks.
* Experience building MVPs that scaled into production.



  




 Why Join ReadyOS
 * Early impact: shape product decisions and architecture.
* Lean, execution\\-focused culture.
* Opportunities to grow into leadership as the company scales.
* Competitive contract rate and potential for equity bonus.



  




 Compensation \\& Incentives
 * **Primary structure:** 
 Contract\\-based, with base pay plus milestone bonuses (e.g., database schema, API modules, compliance tool integration) Payments are tied to milestone completion:



 Weekly base: ‚Çπ12,000
 



 Per milestone: ‚Çπ12,500 (√ó5 \\= ‚Çπ62,500\\)
 



 Schema \\+ Auth Setup
 



 Core API Endpoints
 



 Business Logic Workflows
 



 Integration \\+ QA
 



 Final Handover
 



 7 weeks: ‚Çπ84,000 base \\+ ‚Çπ62,500 milestones \\=
 **‚Çπ146,500 total** 



* **Bonus Equity option:** 
 For the right candidates, we are open to granting a small equity stake (up to 0\\.025% \\~2,500 shares) as an on\\-time/quality bonus.
* **Future potential:** 
 Strong performers may transition into a longer\\-term or leadership role as the backend team expands, but no ongoing commitment is guaranteed at this point.

description:
We're hiring an SDE III for the India development center of a fast\\-growing US\\-based enterprise software company in Bangalore.
 



  





 The company builds real\\-time data connectivity and integration products that help enterprises unify and access fragmented data across hundreds of cloud, SaaS, and on\\-premises systems. Their solutions power digital transformation initiatives globally.
 



  





 We are looking for a Software Development Engineer III (SDE\\-III) to join the Bangalore team.
 



  





  





 Role Details
 



  




* Title: Software Development Engineer III
* Location: Bangalore, India (Hybrid ‚Äì On\\-site)
* Work Week: 5 days (Mon‚ÄìFri)
* Compensation: ‚Çπ25‚Äì35 LPA



  





  





 What You‚Äôll Do
 



  





 As an SDE\\-III, you‚Äôll work on Java\\-based web applications (on\\-prem and SaaS) and help design, develop, and maintain mission\\-critical features. Responsibilities include:
 



  




* Analyzing business requirements and providing accurate estimates.
* Designing and developing backend systems with Core Java and relational databases.
* Developing rich UI features using React.js (expertise strongly desired).
* Building frameworks, critical components, and leading proof\\-of\\-concepts.
* Performing integration testing, performance engineering, and code reviews.
* Creating design artifacts (HLD/LLD, technical specifications).
* Collaborating with product managers, QA, and cross\\-functional stakeholders in an Agile/Scrum setup.
* Mentoring team members and staying ahead on industry trends.



  





  





 What We‚Äôre Looking For
 



  




* 5\\+ years hands\\-on development experience in Java\\-based applications and React.js (at least 1\\.5\\+ years in recent projects).
* Strong knowledge of databases, design patterns, algorithms, and data structures.
* Experience with performance, security, and throughput optimization for web apps.
* Familiarity with RDBMS/SQL and cloud technologies (Azure preferred).
* Exposure to Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD tools, GIT/SVN, Jira.
* Self\\-starter with excellent problem\\-solving, organizational, and interpersonal skills.
* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related STEM field.
* Experience in the Data Integration / BI domain is a plus.



  





  





 Why Join
 



  




* Work on cutting\\-edge data integration \\& connectivity products used worldwide.
* Collaborate with a strong global engineering team.
* Competitive compensation (‚Çπ25‚Äì35 LPA).
* Hybrid flexibility with an established Bangalore office.
* Opportunities to mentor, lead, and grow in a fast\\-scaling global company.



  





  





 How to Apply
 



  





 Email your resume to hiring@rmkhr.com
 



  





 ‚ûï Include a 1\\-minute video introduction explaining why you'd be a good fit ‚Äì candidates submitting a video will be prioritized for interviews.

 As a
 **Senior DevOps Engineer in Black Duck SRE/DevOps team** 
 , you will play a key role in transforming our R\\&D products through the adoption of advanced cloud, Containerization, Microservices, modern software delivery and other cutting edge technologies. You will be a key member of the team, working independently to develop tools and scripts, automated provisioning, deployment, and monitoring.

 3 \\- 5 Years

 (

 ‚Äì 3 days‚Äô work from Office)

* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
* A minimum of
 **3 years of experience in Site Reliability Engineering / DevOps Engineering.**
* **Strong hands\\-on experience with** 
 Containerization \\& Orchestration using
 **Docker, Kubernetes (K8s), Helm** 
 to
 **Secure, optimize, and scale K8s**

 Cloud Platforms \\& Services in AWS / GCP / Azure (Preferably GCP) cloud to

 Infrastructure as a Code (IaaC) using
 **Terraform** 
 / CloudFormation / Pulumi. (Preferably Terraform) \\-

 , Python / Golang \\-

* A collaborative, inclusive, and diverse work environment where creativity and innovation are valued.

title: Game Developer (Unity): 5+ years of experience
description:
**Game Developer (Unity) : 5\\+ Years** 




**Location: Remote** 




  





**Tech\\-Stack Focused JD** 




  





 Build and deploy 2D/3D games using Unity3D/Unity Engine (C\\#) with strong grasp of game loops, physics, and rendering pipelines.
 



  





 Integrate multiplayer networking (Photon, Mirror, Netcode for GameObjects) for real\\-time or turn\\-based gameplay at scale.
 



  





 Implement AR/VR features using Vuforia, ARCore/ARKit, Kudan, Google Cardboard, HTC Vive, Oculus SDKs.
 



  





 Design and manage in\\-app purchases \\& ads with Unity IAP, Prime31, Google/Apple IAP, AdMob, UnityAds, IronSource, AppLovin.
 



  





 Create robust backend/game services with Firebase (Auth, Firestore, Cloud Functions), PlayFab, Node.js for live ops and analytics.
 



  





 Optimize performance (memory, draw calls, load times) with Addressables, Object Pooling, DOTS/ECS, Burst Compiler, Profiler.
 



  





 Develop reusable UI/UX systems using UGUI, TextMeshPro, 2D Toolkit, animations with Tween/DOTween.
 



  





 Implement cross\\-platform builds (iOS, Android, Windows, WebGL) and handle store submissions, CI/CD (Git, Jenkins, Unity Cloud Build).
 



  





 Apply game analytics \\& social integrations (Unity Analytics, GameAnalytics, Facebook/Twitter SDKs) for engagement and monetization.
 



  





 Collaborate in agile teams, perform code reviews, maintain clean architecture \\& SOLID principles, and mentor junior Unity developers.

title: Alteryx ETL Developer
description:
**Company Description**
  

 Office Solution AI Labs is a global consulting and GEN AI powerhouse specializing in Outsourced Product Development, Business Process Management, and Custom Application Development \\& Maintenance. Since 2012, we have been committed to delivering excellent and timely services to our clients across the United States, the United Kingdom, Canada, Europe, and Dubai. As an Authorized Microsoft Partner, we leverage cutting\\-edge technologies like D3, React, and TypeScript to create custom charts and Power BI custom charts. Our AI\\-enabled chatbot enhances decision\\-making efficiency by providing instant answers to ad\\-hoc queries. With over 10 years in the IT industry, we have a track record of generating $3 billion in value for our clients.
   

  

**Role Description**
  

 This is a full\\-time remote role for an Alteryx ETL Developer. The Alteryx ETL Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining ETL workflows and processes using Alteryx. Daily tasks include data integration, data modeling, and performing analytical tasks to support business processes. The role also involves collaborating with various teams to ensure accurate and timely data delivery, troubleshooting issues, and continuously improving data workflows.
   

  

**Qualifications**
  

* Proficient in Extract Transform Load (ETL) processes and ETL tools
* Strong Analytical Skills and experience in Data Integration
* Experience in Data Modeling
* Ability to troubleshoot and resolve data\\-related issues
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field
* Experience with Alteryx is highly preferred
* Knowledge of other BI tools like Power BI, Tableau, or Qlikview is an advantage

title: Senior Web3 Engineer
job_function: Engineering, Product Management, and Project Management
description:
We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Web3 Engineer with deep expertise in blockchain protocols, smart contract development, and security practices. The ideal candidate will have hands\\-on experience across multiple chains and ecosystems, including Aptos, Arbitrum, OKX, Bitcoin Taproot, and strong knowledge of Layer 1 and Layer 2 networks. This role requires proficiency in Solidity and Move for smart contracts, advanced knowledge of bridging and interoperability, and a strong understanding of security threats and mitigation strategies in DeFi.
 







**Key Responsibilities** 







* Smart Contract Development \\& Deployment
* Design, develop, and deploy secure smart contracts using Solidity and Move (.move).
* Implement cross\\-chain functionality, bridges, and interoperability solutions.
* Optimize smart contracts for gas efficiency, scalability, and security.
* Blockchain Infrastructure
* Set up, run, and maintain nodes and staking environments across multiple blockchains (L1 \\& L2\\).
* Contribute to protocol integration with Aptos, Arbitrum, OKX, BTC Taproot, and other ecosystems.
* Security \\& Auditing
* Conduct in\\-depth smart contract audits, both manual and with tools (e.g., Slither, MythX, Echidna, Foundry).
* Identify and mitigate vulnerabilities such as diamond attacks, civil attacks, sandwich attacks, MBV (Miner/Maximal Extractable Value) and other exploits.
* Implement best practices for contract upgradability and secure protocol design.
* Zero\\-Knowledge Proofs \\& Cryptography
* Develop and integrate ZK\\-proof systems for privacy\\-preserving transactions.
* Collaborate with researchers and engineers on novel cryptographic solutions.
* Collaboration \\& Documentation
* Work closely with product, security, and research teams to deliver robust blockchain solutions.
* Create detailed technical documentation and contribute to internal knowledge sharing.







**Skills \\& Experience** 







* 5\\+ years in software development, including 3\\+ years in blockchain development.
* Programming Languages: Solidity, Move (.move), Rust, JavaScript/TypeScript, Python (preferred).
* Blockchain Expertise: Aptos, Arbitrum, OKX, BTC Taproot, Ethereum, Layer 1 \\& Layer 2 solutions.
* Smart Contracts \\& Security: Strong grasp of bridging, contract patterns, and vulnerabilities (reentrancy, diamond, sandwich, MBV, etc.).
* Auditing Tools: Familiarity with tools like Slither, MythX, Foundry, Tenderly, Echidna, Certora.
* Infrastructure: Node setup, validator operation, staking mechanisms, RPC management.
* Cryptography: Understanding of ZKPs, elliptic curve cryptography, and consensus mechanisms.
* Problem Solving: Ability to diagnose complex blockchain issues and propose scalable solutions.







**Qualifications** 




  




* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field (Master‚Äôs preferred).
* Prior contributions to open\\-source blockchain projects.
* Experience in building or auditing DeFi protocols.
* Familiarity with bridging protocols (e.g., Wormhole, LayerZero).
* Experience with rollups, sidechains, and modular blockchain design.
* Active participation in Web3 communities and hackathons.
